history.narrative: Law 18-94, the “Public Assistance Amendment Act of 2009”, as introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-6, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The bill as adopted on first and second readings on September 22, 2009, and October 6, 2009, respectively. Effective without the Mayor’s signature on October 21, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 18-221 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-94 became effective on December 17, 2009.
